channel.title: Compiler error ('javac' is not recognized as...)
channel.description:
Hey guys I'm new to RSPS programming and JAVA overall. As I'll have programming class next year I wanted to learn some JAVA just by hosting a simple 317 remake. So, I tried using the RuneSource for it. However, whenever I try to compile it gives me the following:
[code]A subdirectory or file bin already exists. [Wed 01/23/2013 10:29:13.16]: Compiling source code... 'Compiling source code... 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file., operable program or batch file. [Wed 01/23/2013 10:29:13.16]: Error compiling! The directory is not empty. [Wed 01/23/2013 10:29:13.16]: Done! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
The compiler code is: [code]@echo off @title [%date% %time%] RuneSource Compiler
:compile mkdir bin cd bin echo [%date% %time%]: Compiling source code... javac -d ./ ../src/*.java if not exist Server.class goto error
:deploy echo [%date% %time%]: Deploying into JAR executable... jar cf ../RuneSource.jar *.class
:cleanup del /f /q *.* cd ../ rd bin
echo [%date% %time%]: Done! pause exit
:error echo [%date% %time%]: Error compiling! goto cleanup[/code]
I do have JDK installed and I do have javac file in there. I would really appreciate if anybody told me what I'm doing wrong.
Thanks!

@snaes1 wrote:

I am using the latest JDK, jdk1.7.0_11

item.title: Compiler error ('javac' is not recognized as...)
item.dc:creator: @snaes1 snaes1
item.description:
@snaes1 wrote:

Hey guys I’m new to RSPS programming and JAVA overall. As I’ll have programming class next year I wanted to learn some JAVA just by hosting a simple 317 remake. So, I tried using the RuneSource for it. However, whenever I try to compile it gives me the following:

A subdirectory or file bin already exists. [Wed 01/23/2013 10:29:13.16]: Compiling source code... 'Compiling source code... 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file., operable program or batch file. [Wed 01/23/2013 10:29:13.16]: Error compiling! The directory is not empty. [Wed 01/23/2013 10:29:13.16]: Done! Press any key to continue . . .

The compiler code is:

[code]@echo off
@title [%date% %time%] RuneSource Compiler

:compile
mkdir bin
cd bin
echo [%date% %time%]: Compiling source code…
javac -d ./ …/src/*.java
if not exist Server.class goto error

:deploy
echo [%date% %time%]: Deploying into JAR executable…
jar cf …/RuneSource.jar *.class

:cleanup
del /f /q .
cd …/
rd bin

echo [%date% %time%]: Done!
pause
exit

:error
echo [%date% %time%]: Error compiling!
goto cleanup[/code]

I do have JDK installed and I do have javac file in there.
I would really appreciate if anybody told me what I’m doing wrong.

Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Compiler error ('javac' is not recognized as...)
